ModMetaData.name: Elder Scrolls Xenotypes
ModMetaData.author: Suraru
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in the 10 main races as xenotypes (Imperial (Colovian and Nibenese), Breton, Redguard, Nord, Altmer, Dunmer, Bosmer, Orsimer, Argonian, and Khajiit) as well as 6 khajjit subtypes (Cathay, Suthay, Tojay, Dagi, Ohmes, Pahmar) as well as some basic factions.
Requires: -Harmony -Vaniila Expanded Framework -Vanilla Ideology Expanded: Memes & Structures -Humanoid Alien Races -[insert gene mods here before you upload, suraru, you dummy]
Also has optional compatibility with: -Morrowrim -Rim of Madness - Bones (I also highly recommend these mods)
Additional thanks to https://www.deviantart.com/okiir for their flags I used as a base to create my icons.
